alert.note: Alert for Wayne (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 7:26PM EDT until August 07 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Delaware County in central New York... Northwestern Sullivan County in central New York... Northeastern Wayne County in northeastern Pennsylvania... * Until 815 PM EDT. * At 725 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Stalker, or 17 miles north of Honesdale, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fremont, Stalker, Equinunk, Roscoe, Peabrook, Hankins, Lake Como, Callicoon Center, Shandelee and Abrahamsville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for central New York...and northeastern Pennsylvania. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
